article.title: General Atomics to Retrofit MQ-9 Reapers
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Air Force Life Cycle Management Center

article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems of San Diego, California, is being awarded an $87,338,761 firm fixed price, cost plus fixed fee contract for MQ-9 Reaper FY10/11 retrofit kits and installations for up to 80 aircraft. The contracting activity is the Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Dayton, Ohio.
